last_episode_to_air.name: Dybbuk Box: The Opening
last_episode_to_air.overview: Zak reveals a terrifying secret when the crew investigates the Dybbuk Box in the Haunted Museum. COVID-19 has spread fear worldwide, and the guys risk everything on the final night as they prepare to open the cursed relic in this supercharged atmosphere.

name: Ghost Adventures: Quarantine
overview: The fearless four quarantine themselves for two weeks in Bagans' famed 'Haunted Museum' in Las Vegas, all by themselves.

episodes.name: Perimeter of Fear
episodes.overview: Zak and the crew find themselves in Las Vegas, a town seemingly abandoned.

episodes.name: Extension of Darkness
episodes.overview: The crew continues their lockdown at the Haunted Museum during the COVID-19 pandemic. The guys confront pure evil as they investigate the dark corridors of the infamous basement and the room where Zak displays his collection of serial killer artifacts.

episodes.name: The Summoning Experiments
episodes.overview: The crew enters the phase three of their investigation at Zak's museum in Las Vegas, NV. The guys risk their souls as they perform dangerous summoning experiments to find out how mankind's spiritual energy has been impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic.

episodes.name: Dybbuk Box: The Opening
episodes.overview: Zak reveals a terrifying secret when the crew investigates the Dybbuk Box in the Haunted Museum. COVID-19 has spread fear worldwide, and the guys risk everything on the final night as they prepare to open the cursed relic in this supercharged atmosphere.
